DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether single incision technique double incision technique effective surgical treatment distal bicep tendon rupture . Patients randomize one two technique upon consent study . Prior surgery patient elbow flexion , extension , pronation , supination strength measure . Elbow Range motion also measure four movement . A number subjective questionnaire also administer patient prior surgery . The identical objective test subjective questionnaire complete patient interval three month , six month , one year , two year follow surgery . Additional information patient clinical visit may also collect throughout study .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Comparing Single Versus Double Incision Repair Distal Bicep Tendon Ruptures
DOC.criteria: Complete rupture Distal Bicep tendon Acute bicep tendon rupture ( < 10 day since rupture ) 18 year age older Partial rupture Distal Bicep tendon Chronic bicep tendon Ruptures ( > 10 day since rupture ) Under 18 year age
